tweet_text: @greg_macfarlane @poliARB Yeah, perhaps. The only reason I've been envious of the policy is that it was basically an urban growth boundary. text_en: Both awesome fright stories! I can't think of anything involving media for myself off hand. But... The guy that used to drive me home from school when I was young (family friend) years later kidnapped a girl, stabbed her times and decapitated her. True story.
